title: Like mother...like daughter
creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Christine Lamb and ACMI
brief_description: Christine Lamb is constantly told how much she’s like her mother. It is through looking back on her life and all the things her mother taught her, that Lamb learns how similar they really are.
creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Christine Lamb and ACMI
description: Christine Lamb is constantly told how much she’s like her mother. It is through looking back on her life and all the things her mother taught her, that Lamb learns how similar they really are.
